column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The young Arkasodara is staring off into the jungle with worry in his eyes.
With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter any phrase containing “Sushena” to call out for him.
Investigate the sounds.
Use the healing salve on Sushena.
Report to the Arkasodara youth.
Ah, excuse me, but you're a traveler, yes? Would you be willing to take on a personal request? I'm worried for the safety of a friend of mine, and would ask you to check on them.
Thank you. I know you have no shortage of demands on your time. My friend, you see, he's a bit of a private person, and I only wish to know how he is faring after the recent troubles.

However, the journey to his abode is much too dangerous for me to attempt alone, and I wouldn't dare ask another villager to go in my stead. A traveler with a sharp blade, however, could surely get the task done with little effort.

He resides in the jungle to the northwest, or at least, he used to. I'll mark the location on your map─his name is Sushena, and if you <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> his name, he <Emphasis>should</Emphasis> respond.

If my worst fears have come to pass and he is wounded, please use this medicine to treat his wounds. You will be rewarded for your efforts, but I suspect you would have helped me even if I had nothing to give in return.

I've marked the location that Sushena dwells on your map. <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> his name, and hopefully he will respond in turn.
Sushena

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the word “Sushena” near the area marked on your map.
You hear faint sounds of an animal in pain emanating from the direction of the bluffs. Investigate its source.
The yeti appears to be wounded. Perhaps the medicine provided to you will alleviate its suffering.
<huff> <pant>...Ugwah...<pant>...Ungeh...
Although you cannot understand the yeti's words, you can sense the gratitude behind them. Return to the young Arkasodara and inform him that his friend is well.
Welcome back, traveler! So, how was he?

Oh, that's horrible! Still, I suppose I can be grateful that you could treat his wounds. I owe Sushena my life─when I was attacked by one of those terrible pisaca, Sushena's roar drove the monster off.

That was the start of our friendship─one I've treasured ever since. But my family has forbidden me from venturing into the woods, so I haven't been able to check up on him. I know they're only worried for my safety, but still...
What will you say?
You should explain everything to them.
You shouldn't abandon your friend!
You're right, of course. Surely if I explain Sushena's bravery and selflessness, they'd understand. I've nothing to lose by trying, anyways!
Thank you. Not only did you save Sushena, but you've reminded me what true friendship is worth. It's not much, but please, take this!
